{% if doc.custom_sample_record %} {{ frappe.render_template("templates/jinja_lpp_fonts.html") }} {% set owner = frappe.db.get_value( "User", {"name": doc.owner}, ["full_name"], as_dict=True) %} {% set customer = frappe.db.get_value( "Customer", {"name": doc.customer}, ["customer_name"], as_dict=True) %} {% set item = doc.items[0] if doc.items else False %} {% if item %} {% set drawing = set(frappe.db.get_all( "Item Customer Detail", {"parenttype": "Item", "parentfield": "customer_items", "parent": item.item_code, "customer_name": doc.customer}, pluck="custom_drawing_build_sheet_no")) | reject("none") | list %} {% set material = set(frappe.db.get_all( "Item Customer Detail", {"parenttype": "Item", "parentfield": "customer_items", "parent": item.item_code, "customer_name": doc.customer}, pluck="custom_material")) | reject("none") | list %} {% else %} {% set drawing = False %} {% set material = False %} {% endif %}
SAMPLE REQUEST FORM

SR No.: {{ doc.name or "-" }}
Date: {{ doc.transaction_date and frappe.utils.getdate(doc.transaction_date).strftime("%d/%m/%Y") or "-" }}

Date needed by: {{ doc.schedule_date and frappe.utils.getdate(doc.schedule_date).strftime("%d/%m/%Y") or "-" }}

Ref.SR No.: _____________________

Customer: {{ customer.customer_name or "-" }}

Product name: {{ item and item.item_name or "-" }}

Drawing no.: {{ drawing and drawing | join(", ") or "-" }}

Material: {{ material and material | join(", ") or "-" }}

Quantity: {{ item and ("{:,.2f}".format(item.qty) + " " + item.uom) or "-" }}

Remark: {{ doc.terms or "-" }}
